플레이타임 300시간이지만 아직 기본제공 캐릭터 12개(생존자 7 + 살인마 5)

만렙(50레벨)을 아직 못찍었어요.

각 캐릭터별 최소 40레벨을 찍고 전승기술들을 모두 모아 조합해서 사용해야 

이 게임을 제대로 즐긴다고 할 수 있는데, 시간(+블러드포인트)이 무척 오래 걸리기 때문에, 

기본제공 캐릭터들 전승기술부터 모두 획득하고 나서 DLC 구매를 고려해도 좋을 것 같아요.

각 캐릭터별 특성 스킬들을 하나씩 얻어가고, 생존/살인에 도움이 되도록 조합하며 사용하는 재미가 있어요.

스킬 조합을 완성하기 전까지는 생존/살인 둘 다 어정쩡하기때문에 마음을 비우고 가볍게 플레이하도록 해요.

One of the best a-sym multiplayer games on the market, DbD combines a world dripping with atmosphere with a "simple to understand, difficult to master" mechanics system to create a genuinely fun experience. With regular content updates that bring new characters, new maps and new perks, the game manages to feel fresh and fun even after a few hundred hours. Don't get me wrong, Behavior still need to work out some of the kinks, both with the game and with their management style, but this is an amazing game for the price, and you certainly won't lack for reasons to keep coming back.

Let me start off by saying: I have been immensely enjoying this game from the moment I bought it.
The asymmetrical gameplay is done very well, and definitely lends to the overall enjoyment of the game.

Positives:
+ Asymmetrical gameplay where the "strong" player has some major disadvantages that the "weak" players can take advantage of. This allows the game to be more skill based, and allows you to become better at the game.
+ Being both the killer and the survivor is loads of fun. As a killer you get to hunt people and try to get the most out of your special ability. As a survivor, you either have to taunt your way to victory, or hide your way to victory: either strategy is valid with the correct build.
+ The perk system allows players to create unique killers and survivors. Even though there are some perks that most people go for, most players run a unique set of perks, making every game different.
+ Loads of variety in killers and survivors. There's enough killers and survivors to choose from (even though most are locked behind many hours of gameplay or paywalls). This lends to the replayability of the game.
+ Cheap base game. The base game is only 20 bucks, and definitely has enough content to justify this.
+ Killers with a high skill floor exist, and a low skill floor exist. There is something for everyone, including hard to play killers where you get a lot of reward for being good with them. Because of this, the hardest killer in the game is also considered to be the best one (The nurse). The game rewards good players for picking harder characters, but supports worse players with easier to play characters who just don't have the same killing potential.
+ You don't have to win. The goal of the survivors is to repair  5 out of 7 generators, and then open 1 out of 2 doors and escape. The goal of the killer is to down survivors and hang them on hooks. When a person is hooked 3 times, they are sacrificed. Even if you don't sacrifice all 4 players, you still get rank progression and points. Likewise, as a survivor, escaping isn't the only way to win. Distracting the killer or doing loads of objectives even though you got sacrificed can give just as many or more points as escaping.

Negatives:
- Toxic community. The community in the game is incredibly toxic. Going after players who didn't play as well. Disconnecting when the killer gets you in the early stages of the game. Rescuing people right in front of the killer so they instantly get downed again just to get more points. All of these are examples of people being toxic, and are encountered pretty much every round you play.
- Matchmaking is horrible. The ranking system in the game ranks the players from 20 (lowest) to 1 (highest). As a rank 15-12 killer, I have often been matched against an entire team of rank 3-10 survivors. 
- The game is beginner unfriendly. When you start out, you only have level 1 killers and survivors. Even though you get 250k points to level one of them up, it isn't enough. This is because unlocking new perks for your killer or survivor is done leveling up other killers and survivors to almost max level. This, combined with other players ranks being lowered back about 5 ranks (so from 12 to 17) every month, it creates a system where, even at low ranks, lots of people have lots of strong perks. This makes it much harder to start. However, this does not take away from the overall enjoyment of the game.
- Most "strong" perks are locked behind paywalls. The killers and survivors who have amazing perks to unlock for other survivors and killers are mostly locked behind paywalls. (and yes, you can buy them with an in game currency gained by leveling up your account, but this is incredibly slow and takes about 20-25 hours of gameplay per perk).

Overall I still recommend this game. Even though it has some flaws, the game isn't competitive enough to really make them a problem. It's incredibly fun to play and I will gladly pick this up any day of the week to just play a bit casually.

Arkadaşlar ile girildiği zaman güzel oyun fakat karşınıza leatherface doktor nurse huntress gibi katiller gelirse işiniz zor oyuna ragelenebilirsiniz. (27 Ekim 2020)
lanet olsun gerçekten oyun kendini öldürdü ilk başta gerek oyunu korkarak oynardık gerek taktik yaparak ama şuan oyuna troll olarak bile girenler var. oyun daha çok gay oyununa dönmüş koskoca korku temalı oyundan hooked on you diye bir oyun çıktı zaten bu oyunun ne kadar çöktüğünü gösteriyor. baksanıza abi dbd instagram sitesine gidin oyun çocuksu olmuş iyice birde bu gay etkinliğinden yararlanan toxic insanlar çıkmış sayfaya gidip oyun ölüyor yazınca ''oynama o zaman, yaşasın renkli evren, yaşasın aot,'' gibi şeyler yazıyorlar açıkcası oyun zaten öldü üstüne birde toxic fan kitlesi edinmiş. ZATEN DEAD HARD REWORK HAKKINDA KONUŞMAYA GEREK DUYMUYORUM. şu oyunda ki 2019-2020 vibeını şimdi hiç alamıyorum. kim ne derse desin bu oyun TRICKSTER dlc sinden sonra birdaha asla eskisi gibi olmadı...
gerçekten ekipçe oynadığımız bir oyundu herkese alın diyordum oynarız diyordum ama şuan kimsenin almasını önermiyorum. Zaten artık oyunda tek başına survivor girmeniz imkansız hale gelmiş. hele kırmızı rank iseniz yani oyun git gide kötü hal almaya başlamış. Umarım bir gün Behaviour Interactive eski oyuncularını düşünüp oyundaki bazı şeyleri değiştir ve eski günlerimize geri döneriz tabii bu demek istediğim oyun birdaha asla güncelleme almasın değil. sadece o eski karanlık ve korkulu havasına geri dönsün ve bozduğu perkleri geri düzeltsin eğer bunu yapabilirse gerçekten oyuncu sayısı daha fazla artar.
yani uzun lafın kısası eskiden tavsiye ettiğim bir oyundu ama şimdi 100 lira vermeyin bu oyuna derim. Hele ki ekibiniz yoksa kesinlikle almayın onun yerine bunun gibi bir leatherface oyunu gelecekmiş diyorlar onu bekleyin derim. iyi günler

Très bon jeu stressant et intense, on a pas le temps de se regarder entre les 4 joueurs qui composent l'équipe des survivants. Il oblige donc une sacré cohésion d'équipe si les joueurs ne veulent pas finir pendu 1 par 1. Les mises à jour sont régulières et apportent un + surtout a des périodes comme Halloween ou l'ambiance est retravaillée. Je trouve en revanche le jeu un peu gourmand compte tenu des caractéristiques techniques recommandé qui sembles facilement atteignables au premier abords mais qui en réalité sont bien en dessous de ce qu'il faudrait réellement pour ne pas jouer en Low avec des textures plates. Ne vous attendez juste pas a pouvoir profiter pleinement  d'un écrans  144Hz sur le jeu. Mon avis reste donc positif sur le jeu et on se tape des bon gros délires a y jouer a plusieurs.Si je devais lui attribuer une note, je lui donnerais 7/10.

Dead by Daylight идеально воссоздает кульминацию почти любого слэшера: когда сценами обильного кровопускания зрителей уже развлекли и дело идет к развязке. Выжившие герои нашли путь к спасению. Они уже знают, что именно нужно сделать, чтобы ускользнуть от маньяка и вернуться домой, сохранив все конечности. Но безжалостный убийца идет по пятам. Все решают минуты. История вот-вот закончится. Зрители замерли в напряжении.
► Жертвы бегают медленнее маньяка, зато через оконные проемы скачут куда быстрее, а еще могут опрокидывать предметы, перекрывая убийце путь, и слышат его сердцебиение, когда он поблизости.
► Раненая жертва будет обильно орошать окрестности кровью, оставляя еще больше следов, да и стоны, выдающие ее местоположение, сдержать не сможет.
Основу геймплея составляет изначальный выбор роли жертвы или убийцы. Ты сам выбираешь кем стать - выживающим, на чьих нервах будут играть как на гитаре, или сам будешь дергать за струны и щекотать нервы своим жертвам играя за маньяка.
Если вы хотите эмоции и веселье, то смело покупайте эту игру)
Всем удачи!

全新的匹配机制，20年上过一段，后面不常玩 保持3456的屠夫，今天在日服（排到的全是韩国人）玩凛玩小叮当匹配到的全是车队 无一例外 ， 改的挺好的 屠夫接车队的体验是真的不错 恶咒把把开局炸 语音配合又好。果然人还是太弱了 只要能活过一个擦刀就能跑人 要求果然还是太高了  很多地图还是太小了，建议可以再改大一点，屠夫尔康手的bug也可以不修，这样平衡些，人现在太鶸了，屠夫太强了，什么局都可以随便玩玩乱杀，导致屠夫玩家数量太多了匹配要很久，真心建议对所有屠夫都进行一波合理削弱，削减屠夫玩家数量平衡匹配时间。

Очень давно играю в эту игру в основном за выжившего. Опыт накоплен огромный и наиграно несколько тысяч часов. Но этот обзор будет резко отрицательным потому что разработчики слишком увлеклись добавлением текстур, платных дополнений и совсем забыли про игровой процесс и людей, которые играют в эту игру.  Т.е. полностью на 100% забили на читерство в игре - 2/3 игр теперь идут с читами, которые полностью нивелируют удовольствие от игры и меняют результат - маньяки попадают не глядя, видят всех сквозь стены и тд и тп - в инете полно видео на эту тему. Если желание самоутвердится со стороны отдельных несозревших личностей за счет эффемерных побед в игровом пространстве с читами понятно (ну пиписка маленькая еще - хоть как-то компенсируют), то разработчики....все книги, хистори и тд. что вы добавляете в игру бессмысленны если в итоге становится играть неинтересно  - ваша система античитерства нерабочая абсолютно.  ВСЕ читы доступны в интернете за копейки - купите  их - изучите и залатайте дыры, сделайте рабочую систему защиты от читов для сообщества - смысл любой игры в ее балансе, нарушение баланса делайте игру не интересной. 
PS еще ни один репорт не получил ответа и не был рассмотрен. Это пишут все игроки.

Addicting as fuck. Still sucks until you get a few characters for their perks. Recommend you buy this on sale and pick and choose which DLCs you want, don't buy all of them since a large chunk of the perks are really bad.

For killers:
1. Clown is a must have for Pop Goes the Weasel.
2. Yeah that's it, other perks vary according to killer. Go watch a youtuber recommending builds to decide which DLCs to buy, I recommend Otzdarva(and Not Otzdarva) on Youtube

For survivors:
1. Laurie from the Halloween DLC gives you access to decisive strike
2. FUCK OBJECT, DO NOT RUN THIS PERK OR YOU WILL BE TUNNELED TO DEATH.
3. Level Bill Overbeck and David King for Unbreakable, Borrowed Time, and Dead Hard
4. Alternatively, level Meg Thomas for Sprint Burst to replace Dead Hard

[h1]恶灵需要的不是鲜血，是恐惧和痛苦！[/h1]
玩这游戏前我天真的以为恶灵需要的是血肉，没想到恶灵是玩艺术的需要恐惧和痛苦这种抽象的东西！
[h1][quote=]
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]　欢迎关注 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38287879]网易UU鉴赏家培养计划[/url][/th]

[/table]
[/quote][/h1]
[h1]不是恐怖游戏，只是披着恐怖游戏皮的竞技游戏[/h1]
作为非对称竞技游戏中的代表作，黎明杀机确实很有特色，像极了小时候玩的躲猫猫，只不过被抓了会流血，会死！
游戏非常有趣味性，无论是屠夫猎杀偷电贼还是偷电贼遛狗屠夫，都会让某一方获得极大的快乐，让另一方极度生气却无计可施。
建议不要和关系特别好的朋友一起玩，容易导致友谊小船说翻就翻。
屠夫大多有现实原型或者传说人物作为参考，有一说一，人心才是最险恶的东西，比如某个喜欢用电的家伙，可真是坏透了。
游戏其实可以改改算法，新玩家老是匹配不到人有点烦！
这游戏算是斗智斗勇的游戏的典范，很多时候要的是心机才能获胜！不适合小孩子玩哦，这游戏太血腥！
